description_parts: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
subtitle: Gulp!
title: Swallowed Penny

description_parts: While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.
subtitle: It feels lucky?
title: Petrified Poop

description_parts: Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1.
Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room.
For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead.
subtitle: Trickle charge
title: AAA Battery

description_parts: Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item.
Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms).
subtitle: It's broken
title: Broken Remote

description_parts: Higher chance for champion enemies while held.
subtitle: Challenge up
title: Purple Heart

description_parts: Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance.
Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does.
subtitle: It kinda works
title: Broken Magnet

description_parts: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).
subtitle: Faith up
title: Rosary Bead

description_parts: When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.
The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.
subtitle: I remember these
title: Cartridge

description_parts: Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.
Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.
subtitle: Wub wub!
title: Pulse Worm

description_parts: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.
subtitle: Wiggle wiggle!
title: Wiggle Worm

description_parts: While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.
Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.
subtitle: Woop woop!
title: Ring Worm

description_parts: Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox.
Higher knockback effect with your tears.
subtitle: Blub blub!
title: Flat Worm

description_parts: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.
subtitle: YES!
title: Store Credit

description_parts: Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held.
subtitle: Your feet feel stronger
title: Callus

description_parts: Rocks now drop money when broken.
subtitle: There's something inside
title: Lucky Rock

description_parts: Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent.
Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!
title: Mom's Toenail

description_parts: Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.
subtitle: Evil up
title: Black Lipstick

description_parts: Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.
Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.
subtitle: Faith up
title: Bible Tract

description_parts: Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.
Does not work on locked rooms.
subtitle: Master of lockpicking
title: Paper Clip

description_parts: When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.
After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.
subtitle: Wish granted
title: Monkey's Paw

description_parts: Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.
A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.

Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
title: Mysterious Paper

description_parts: When Daemon's Tail is held, most future Heart drop will be rerolled into something else, with a certain chance to be rerolled into a Black Heart.
Every type of heart will be affected (except for hearts spawned in Super Secret Rooms) and causes Mitre, Bible Tract, Mom's Pearl to become useless.
Upon entering a new room that already has hearts on the ground, they will all be converted into Black Hearts.

Hearts that spawn after clearing a room, opening a chest or playing a slot machine/beggar will be re-rolled into another possible pickup that could appear. This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of all other pickups
subtitle: Evil up
title: Daemon's Tail

description_parts: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
title: Missing Poster

description_parts: Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart.
subtitle: Wealth of gas
title: Butt Penny

description_parts: Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.
subtitle: Uh-oh!
title: Mysterious Candy

description_parts: Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room.
Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal.
subtitle: Zip zoop!
title: Hook Worm

description_parts: +0.5 Shot Speed Up.
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.
subtitle: Wooosh!
title: Whip Worm

description_parts: Has a chance (roughly 20%) to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die.
subtitle: Eternal life?
title: Broken Ankh

description_parts: Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn.
subtitle: It stinks
title: Fish Head

description_parts: Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.
The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.
The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
subtitle: Poison shots
title: Pinky Eye

description_parts: Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.
The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
subtitle: Piercing shots
title: Push Pin

description_parts: While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room
Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass.
subtitle: Touch fuzzy, get dizzy!
title: Liberty Cap

description_parts: If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.
subtitle: Fetal protection
title: Umbilical Cord

description_parts: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests.
subtitle: It calls out to its brothers
title: Child's Heart

description_parts: +2 Damage Up
subtitle: DMG up
title: Curved Horn

description_parts: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.
subtitle: It feels lucky?
title: Rusted Key

description_parts: +0.15 Speed Up.
subtitle: Speed up
title: Goat Hoof

description_parts: Grants a secondary chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a soul heart.
subtitle: It emanates purity
title: Mom's Pearl

description_parts: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is.
Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum.
subtitle: Yay, cancer!
title: Cancer

description_parts: You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.
subtitle: Your rage grows
title: Red Patch

description_parts: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs.
Picking up the Match Stick is the only way to remove the Tick trinket.
subtitle: Tastes like burning
title: Match Stick

description_parts: +1 Luck Up while held.
subtitle: Luck up!
title: Lucky Toe

description_parts: When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.
subtitle: Cursed?
title: Cursed Skull

description_parts: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.
subtitle: Don't swallow it
title: Safety Cap

description_parts: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.
subtitle: Luck of the draw
title: Ace of Spades

description_parts: After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart.
subtitle: Consume thy enemy
title: Isaac's Fork

description_parts: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time.
subtitle: It glows with power
title: A Missing Page

description_parts: Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor.
subtitle: Wealth of health
title: Bloody Penny

description_parts: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.
subtitle: Wealth of chaos
title: Burnt Penny

description_parts: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a key.
subtitle: Wealth of answers
title: Flat Penny

description_parts: When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin.
subtitle: Wealth of wealth
title: Counterfeit Penny

description_parts: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.

This trinket can only be removed by using the Smelter item (Afterbirth+ DLC only) or picking up the Match Stick trinket, meaning you are otherwise unable to take any more trinkets unless you get another item which allows you to hold a second trinket (e.g. Mom's Purse).
subtitle: Well, that's not coming off
title: Tick

description_parts: While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
subtitle: Dead friend
title: Isaac's Head

description_parts: At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart.
subtitle: Faith's reward
title: Maggy's Faith

description_parts: Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart.
subtitle: Payment received
title: Judas' Tongue

description_parts: Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac.
subtitle: Imaginary friend
title: ???'s Soul

description_parts: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
subtitle: Your rage grows
title: Samson's Lock

description_parts: Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass).
subtitle: May you see your destination
title: Cain's Eye

description_parts: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar.
The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them.
subtitle: Revenge from beyond
title: Eve's Bird Foot

description_parts: Replaces chest spawns with red chests.
subtitle: The left hand path reaps dark rewards
title: The Left Hand

description_parts: While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds.
subtitle: It shines for it's brothers
title: Shiny Rock

description_parts: Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use.
Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups.
subtitle: Fuse cutter
title: Safety Scissors

description_parts: Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds.
The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm
subtitle: Bleep bloop blop
title: Rainbow Worm

description_parts: While held, Tape Worm doubles your range stat and halves your tear height stat.
subtitle: Floooooooooop!
title: Tape Worm

description_parts: -0.4 Shot Speed Down.
+4.0 Range Up.
+2.0 Tear Height.
subtitle: Pft
title: Lazy Worm

description_parts: Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect.
subtitle: You feel cursed... kinda.
title: Cracked Dice

description_parts: While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you.
Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities.
subtitle: It pulls
title: Super Magnet

description_parts: Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them.
subtitle: You feel faded
title: Faded Polaroid

description_parts: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies.
subtitle: Itchy, tasty...
title: Louse

description_parts: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it.
subtitle: Creepy bombs
title: Bob's Bladder

description_parts: Gives you an increased chance of finding battery consumables.
Has a chance to add an extra charge to your active item upon completing a room.
subtitle: Lil charge
title: Watch Battery

description_parts: Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up.
subtitle: Pop! Pop!
title: Blasting Cap

description_parts: Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks.
subtitle: The ground below feels hollow...
title: Stud Finder

description_parts: Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game.
Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.
subtitle: Effect not found?
title: Error

description_parts: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy.
subtitle: It's double down time!
title: Poker Chip

description_parts: Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held
subtitle: Bounce back!
title: Blister

description_parts: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.
subtitle: Extended stat effect time
title: Second Hand

description_parts: While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you.
subtitle: I'm stuck in a loop...
title: Endless Nameless

description_parts: +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have.
Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin.
subtitle: With darkness comes power
title: Black Feather

description_parts: Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)
This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage.
subtitle: Blind to damage
title: Blind Rage

description_parts: +15% chance to get a double item room to spawn on the next floor.
If the effect activates, two items spawn in your item room, however only one can be taken (Same effect as the More Options item)
The chance doubles to +30% with the effect from Mom's Box.
subtitle: Feel lucky?
title: Golden Horse Shoe

description_parts: Automatically opens all shop room doors for free.
subtitle: Stores are open
title: Store Key

description_parts: Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms.
subtitle: Feels greedy
title: Rib of Greed

description_parts: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar.
subtitle: Karma up
title: Karma

description_parts: Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly
subtitle: the poop is moving...
title: Lil Larva

description_parts: While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest.
Changes all half red hearts into full hearts.
subtitle: you feel her love
title: Mom's Locket

description_parts: While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items.
It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items.
Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn.
Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket.
subtitle: Never again!
title: NO!

description_parts: Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other.
subtitle: Keep your friends close...
title: Child Leash

description_parts: Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed.
subtitle: Fartoom!
title: Brown Cap

description_parts: While held you have an increased chance for Black Poops to spawn, which deal damage to all enemies in the room when destroyed
Gives The Poop active item a chance to spawn a Black Poop too
subtitle: Eww
title: Meconium

description_parts: Gives you extra stat upgrades based on the items you've already collected that have stat increases, at roughly +30% of the item's original increase
Also gives you a tears up if you don't already have an item that increases your tears stat
subtitle: Boost Stats
title: Cracked Crown

description_parts: While held, gives the Skatole effect only in certain rooms, which will turn hostile flies to neutral and stop others from shooting.
Attack, Dart and Ring Flies turn into neutral Black Flies and Pooters and Fat Flies will no longer fire at you.
subtitle: You Stink
title: Used Diaper

description_parts: Items and trinkets which generate blue flies and spiders will have double the effect, causing twice as many to spawn
subtitle: It also stinks!
title: Fish Tail

description_parts: Some tears will randomly become a black tooth, that deal double your normal tear damage and can poison enemies
subtitle: It looks dead
title: Black Tooth

description_parts: Tears become spectral and travel in a large spiral pattern
+4.0 Range Up
subtitle: Foop foop!
title: Ouroboros Worm

description_parts: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to gain a Tonsil familiar, which follows you and blocks enemy projectiles
This effect can happen twice before the Tonsil trinket is destroyed
Does not deal contact damage to enemies

The Tonsil familiar counts as a passive item but does not appear in any item pools, meaning this trinket is the only way to find it (aside from starting with it as Eden) and make it appear in your Items Collection page.
subtitle: Sick...
title: Tonsil

description_parts: Your tears have a random chance to become booger tears
Booger tears stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die or 60 seconds passes. Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
The boogers will have a homing effect
subtitle: Seems magic...
title: Nose Goblin

description_parts: Some random tears will gain the Rubber Cement effect and become bouncy
subtitle: Boing!
title: Super Ball

description_parts: Grants +0.25 Speed, +0.75 Range, +0.1 Shot Speed, +0.2 Tears, +0.5 Damage and +1 Luck when Isaac's active item is fully charged
Infinite use items such as Potato Peeler count as charged and provide the bonus from this trinket
subtitle: It needs power
title: Vibrant Bulb

description_parts: Grants +0.5 Speed, +1.5 Range, +0.3 Shot Speed, +0.4 Tears, +1.5 Damage when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged
One-time use items such as Mama Mega count as uncharged and provide the bonus from this trinket.
subtitle: I think it's broken
title: Dim Bulb

description_parts: Gives you another secret room on each new floor while held
Does not spawn more than one super secret room, only the normal secret room
subtitle: Double moon
title: Fragmented Card

description_parts: When you have the same amount of coins, bombs and keys, half consumables turn into their doubled version
This effect works for any number of consumables, including 0 and 99, as long as the count for coins/keys/bombs is equal
title: Equality!

description_parts: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn a random pedestal item
When the effect triggers, the trinket is destroyed
subtitle: Make a wish
title: Wish Bone

description_parts: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn the Lunch item, which gives +1 HP up
When the effect triggers, this trinket is destroyed
subtitle: I wonder what it is
title: Bag Lunch

description_parts: Increases the radius of any creep you produce
subtitle: Uncorked
title: Lost Cork

description_parts: While held, any damage taken will ignore soul hearts and black hearts, causing your red heart containers to be depleted first
While at 1/2 of a red heart, it will begin to remove your soul hearts and black hearts on damage again.
subtitle: Drain me
title: Crow Heart

description_parts: When you take damage, the walnut cracks and drops a random trinket, coin, heart and key
The Walnut trinket is destroyed once the effect activates
Walking over a dead shopkeeper corpse will trigger the effect
subtitle: Thats a hard nut to crack!
title: Walnut

description_parts: Causes any orbitals you have to stop moving while held
Stops shooting familiars from moving (including Lilith's Incubus)
Some familiars with irregular movement are not affected by Duct Tape, such as Abel, BBF, Bumbo, Guppy's Hair Ball, Lil Gurdy, Punching Bag, Robo-Baby 2.0, Succubus
subtitle: Stuck!
title: Duct Tape

description_parts: While held, shops will now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
subtitle: Feels lucky...
title: Silver Dollar

description_parts: While held, item rooms now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
subtitle: Drips with blood...
title: Bloody Crown

description_parts: While held, restock boxes will always spawn in item rooms
title: Pay To Win

description_parts: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies, dealing double tear damage for the impact of the Locust and 60 damage for the explosion
Can be dangerous as the fly will target the nearest enemy, which can be close enough to catch Isaac in its blast radius
subtitle: I Bring Wrath
title: Locust of War

description_parts: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a green attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and then poison them
subtitle: I Bring Pestilence
title: Locust of Pestilence

description_parts: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a yellow attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and apply a slowing effect to it
subtitle: I bring Famine
title: Locust of Famine

description_parts: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Black Locust that deals quadruple Isaac's damage, applied as two hits of double damage.
subtitle: I bring Death
title: Locust of Death

description_parts: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn 2-5 white attack flies, which will target a nearby enemy and deal double your tear damage to it
subtitle: I Bring Conquest
title: Locust of Conquest

description_parts: When killing an enemy, you have a very small chance to gain the ability to fly for the rest of the room.
subtitle: They Are Growing...
title: Bat Wing

description_parts: Heals you for 1/2 a red heart after travelling down to the next floor
subtitle: Regen!
title: Stem Cell

description_parts: Fully recharges your active item at the start of each boss fight
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Zaratus
subtitle: Poke that power outlet! Bosses charge you
title: Hairpin

description_parts: Gives you the Holy Mantle shield effect at the start of every new floor, which protects you from the next hit of damage you take
Does not recharge until the start of the next floor
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ep and Mills
subtitle: My faith protects me
title: Wooden Cross

description_parts: Using your active item while holding this trinket will drop it back on a pedestal on the ground
Also after taking damage, you have a very small chance to drop one of your passive items
One-time use active items will be consumed and not dropped
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by MarkusLeben and iguesti
subtitle: Can't hold it!
title: Butter!

description_parts: Holding this trinket will cause the Angel mini bosses to drop normal items instead of Key Pieces
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2, designed by Edmund McMillen
subtitle: Angelic spoils!
title: Filigree Feather

description_parts: While held, the last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it
This trinket works on boss rooms (except Ultra Greed) and devil rooms containing Krampus, allowing you to exit out mid-fight
subtitle: Hold the door!
title: Door Stop

description_parts: After being picked up, a yellow laser chain now flows through Isaac's familiars.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom
subtitle: Charged friends
title: Extension Cord
